preqs: ATS1367 and ATS1898 or SCY1802 or equivalents

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {GSC12%, SCY1%} or  (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1356, ATS1367} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1366, ATS1898, SCY1802}))

unitName: Sociology of race and ethnic relations
description: This unit will emphasise the study of social relations between racial and ethnic groups in selected societies. The unit will pay special attention to the place of ethnic and Aboriginal groups in Australia. The concepts of race, racism, ethnicity, prejudice, discrimination and multiculturalism will be analysed and discussed in detail.
